name: How to use the sandbox - Interactive kinematics
description: This tutorial will show how to use the kinematics and inverse kinematics features of the sandbox.

pages.textBefore: Moving the bottom node (clamped translating node) will move the rotating node along with it, keeping the link length using kinematics.
Moving the top node (rotating node) will make the clamped translating node follow it, keeping the link length using inverse kinematics.
